content: Deal enough damage, and the giant will eventually fall to the ground. Use this time to build up several focus points by attacking his head, and Spirit attacks to take more health away.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Valley_of_Ecstasy_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Valley of Ecstasy Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Longevity Road'.
The content is as follows:
Deal enough damage, and the giant will eventually fall to the ground. Use this time to build up several focus points by attacking his head, and Spirit attacks to take more health away.
